titleStmt.title: Jojo's Bizzare Adventure: Steel Ball Run: Chapter 27
titleStmt.author: HiroHiko Araki

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Johnny is currently being entrapped in sand.

Name - "Pork Pie Hat Kid" ; Stand Name - Wired ; Pork Pie Hat's stand looks like a winch, which can wind up its wires with tremendous power. He seems to be able to lift about one horse. Through a plate with water, Pork Pie Hat can lower his hooks through a different dimension to catch his prey. If he uses a bait such as a feather or an insect, he can hook his prey from the bait itself. There are 2 wires.

Name - Gyro Zeppeli ; Ability Name - Steel Ball No. 1, Steel Ball no. 2 ; By spinning the steel balls, Gyro can carve into rocks, as well as harden or numb the skin of living things. Gyro claims it to be a "technique", but it is not true that his power has gotten stronger since passing through the strange land of the "Devil's Palm"? The steel balls have throwing range of 20 to 30 meters.

Name - Johnny Joestar ; Stand Name - Tusk ; Johnny can spin the nails on his hands and feet, and can cut with them and shoot them like bullets. It seems that the nails grow back, no matter how many are shot. The range of the nails is about 10 meters. He can also move around by the friction caused by the spin. When Johnny passed through the "Devil's Palm", the mummified left hand came into Johnny's hand. This was the cause of his stand ability. The guardian of the left arm appears in the form of that shown on the left. That's what it looked like to Johnny.
Hooks are coming down from the sky and have entrapped a snake.
That creep! Where'd he gooooo! I'll kill him!
Jyoshterrr! I'll tear you apart like a spitchcock and kill you for sure!!
Did I...! Did I lose him...? Is he underground? ...He's hiding somewhere, that's for sure...
...But say... This is fucking fun... But so terrible at the same time.
I've got a feeling that he's coming towards this place... But then again, he could be escaping that way through the desert...
I have no idea how he's doing it! That shmuck!
Man...! I'm almost there............. Just one more step to finish him and get the "corpse"...
It seems like the "enemy" can only see and attack from above...
If I got up to the rocks' shade... I should be able to climb without being spotted!
The "enemy" has completely lost track of me!
Plus, the hooks are moving further away!
GWEEEEGACHANG! Horses are obedient and senstitive! They'll return to their masters by smelling and listening for their breaths!
You can have your beloved horse that you've traveled with through this harsh race!
I'll give it back to you, Jyoshterrr!
Hmm, that direction, I see. So he was heading this way.
The place where the horse stops!...
...is where you're located Jyoshter! I'll tear you apart like I said I would!
From here, it's still 500m until the rock mountain...! I need to decide! It will be a one on one battle right here!
I didn't think he would use my horse... He'll find me!
I can't shoot my 'nail shots' from here!
My...my 'nails' won't reach outside the fire!
Just jump out and show your face!
Ah! He moved! Right there! I knew he was in the ground! But I'll try to avoid a close 'one-on-one' battle!
I'll wait until you've been burnt a bit before I tear you with my hooks! The 'corpse' is in your left hand, so there shouldn't be a problem!
As long as the fire doesn't burn you on the inside!
I carved a dead tree into the shape of a person...
And now the wires are right in front of me...
This ability has far surpassed a simple 'nail'...
From now on I will call this 'Tusk'.
Hah Haa Hah Haa Hah Haah
This entire 'Steel Ball Run Race' is basically a terrorist itself! Even the racers... and Stephen Steel... the sponsors... I can't trust anybody...
Except for Gyro... I can only trust in him. I want to hear his opinion on the 'corpse'.
Come on! Where's the 'string' to fix your wound?
Jyoshter! You lose! You fell for it! I made Gyro himself the bait!
That's why I let Gyro live, you twe--rp!
I'll let you live, but only if you hand over the 'corpse'! That's my only goal!
Take it out from your 'arm' and hand it over!
Give the 'corpse' in your left hand to me!
Now! Or do you want to see what this place would look like if Gyro's insides were splattered all over the rocks?!
If I pull the wries, you'll rip through Gyro and come to me!
Johnny and Gyro are attacking Pork Pie.
You're a fun duo! You want to kill Gyro and come fight me?! Shithead!
I don't want to hand it over...what's in my hand...
You can't do anything anymore! Just hand over the 'corpse' for fuck's sake!
Rip through Gyro... and come over here! Jyawnee!
And this is the last time I'll say this!
The hooks come out from where you touch! That's the job of the 'bait'!
And it's you who ripped through him!
But...take out both hooks from Gyro...or else..
I'll destroy this 'corpse's left hand' myself.
My 'ability' is gone... I can't spin them anymore...
I don't know why everyone wants this, but I'm invincible!
I proved that I'm invincible and smart! Now everybody will approve of me! I'll be approved and I can climb up to a higher rank!
The nails won't spin, you say?
They're in the midst of spinning right now.
And now I'll have them die! Gyro is still the 'bait'!!
I should have killed him. But then... I couldn't have used him as a hostage and 'bait'...
Gyro has taken back the corpse.
Well... Maybe a little....... Actually, no.
You're gonna give it back?!....to me...?!
You don't want it?! S...so, the reason you joined the race wasn't to find these 'corpse parts'?
...But I'm starting to get it. The terrorists think that I'm hiding that with me somehwere!
All I want is to finish in 1st place to receive an 'amnesty' from my king.
So you're syaing there are body parts scattered near the course of this race, and that they become a 'unified corpse' if they are all gathered together...
They must have designed the course having a general idea of where the corpse parts are 'located'.
The terrorists, this country, the producer... they're all connected. Otherwise, this wouldn't be possible!
The steel ball run race is a conspiracy to find the scattered 'corpse parts'.
What is this corpse?!...... And whose corpse is it?! I shouldn't have hidden it from you when I found this 'corpse part'... I want to hear your opinion.
...And the terrorists collect all the parts in the end... That's the purpose of this race.
...But 'those with ability' can find the exact location...
I've already made up my mind...................... Yes.
...Already decided to find the rest, too.
Wait... Don't tell me that you;ve...
In many ways...there's no way I'm going back to being a 'quitter'.
But if I lose this, I'm back to the loser that I was... I don't know whose 'corpse' this is...
I see. Well, let's make this clear... Don't count on me.
You'll find it if you investiagte.
There must be some 'record' on that corpse. If these terrorists are searching for a mummified corpse...
But I'll tell you what I think......
But it's probably a corpse of some 'saint'.
Movere crus. I don't know why this is written on your arm, but it's latin. It means... 'move your legs'.
I'm just saying my personal opinion. You must be the type that listens to half of what people say, and then judge them!
This is my assumption...But it's true that there is a 'record'. There is a record in my country.
Gyrooo! So you do know something about this!
Do you know.....what kind of people the word 'saint' is used for?
You can read it? Latin... An old language...
The word 'saint' is used for those who cause 'miracles' after they die!

That's why it takes hundreds of years for some of them to be declared a saint. It points only to those greatest people. And if these terrorsts created a race just to look for the corpse, it must be a very important saint.

Let me repeat that...it's after they die! Not only while they've lived... The papacy has a 'stipulation' that has at least two miracles have to happen after the person's death for them to be labeled a 'saint'!
...And the bodies of saints do not rot for hundreds of years.

Saint Mark was celebrated as the patron saint, and the state that was created on a small island surprisingly prospered for 1000 years. Whether Christian or not, people long for 'saints'. For example, in 828 A.D., when the nation of 'venice' was in its developing stages... It stole the body of 'saint mark', the writers of one of the gospels, from alexandria... Which was part of the byzantine empire at the time.
Any country would move... It's not always plain to see, but people would gladly give their lives for 'saints'. The greatest of saints offer the glory and power of 1000 years.

Believe it or not, it's because the have the 'corpses of saints'. A 'millennial kingdom'... The only nations in history that have prospered for over 1000 years are venice and the vatican, which itself has lasted almost 1900 years. Even the historic edo shogunate of the east only lasted 250 years.
If you do it in the vacitan it'll be easily recognized as a saint......that mummy...
And...'my lame feet moved'... my stand ability... my nails 'spun'...
I'm just saying...if you want to look for the corpse parts, fine...but...
You'll find it if you look it up in my homeland, I'm telling you! 'Saints' exist for the common people... so they can never be hidden in the shadows of history...there's always a record.
But wait, this is the new world! Have any of the 'saints' crossed to America?!
And why are they scattered across this land?
If so--I'll let you come with me, Johnny!
I'm going to be 1st in this race! And you'll be 2nd! Don't forget that promise!
Johnny, gather your stuff! It's Dio and Sandman!
